name: Aam Aadmi Party
description: This Extension covers Aam Aadmi Party News and Videos AAP website news, Facebook news, Twitter news at one place.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self'  https://platform.twitter.com https://ajax.googleapis.com https://cdn.api.twitter.com https://syndication.twitter.com https://cdn.syndication.twimg.com;  object-src 'self';
